text: It would be safer under lock and key for the time being than behind a piece of panelling which did not fit very securely. Tomorrow he would buy a heavy padlock for the box and search for a new hiding-place. He lay in bed, cold and uneasy, unable to account for an instinctive sense of danger.
handwritten_text: It would be safer under lock and key for the time being than behind a piece of panelling which did not fit very securely. Tomorrow he would buy a heavy padlock for the box and search for a new hiding-place. He lay in bed, cold and uneasy, unable to account for an instinctive sense of danger.
